name: 3D Santa Mahjong Solitaire
description:
Hop into the Christmas spirit with the wonderful mahjong games inspired Christmas Mahjong Santa. The classic matching tiles game is here to accompany you in a beautiful Christmas holiday New Year’s theme.

*** ADDICTIVE GAME PLAY ***

Santa Mahjong Tiles is a very addictive and great source of entertainment, you just need to tell that which pair of tiles is matching by tapping on 2 matching active tiles one by one. Tile is Active if it is on the top and at least one side either left or right is open. Be quick and strategical and try to Match upper tiles first.
Quick players can get the bonus of freezing Clock by reaching the Specific combo level.   You can use the Hint button to see the active and nonactive tiles, Try fast, get more score and stars. Challenge your friends to beat your score in the leaderboard.

There are useful control features like undo and reshuffle to pass the level. Currently there are 100 levels available in 10 different structures, try to complete them with all stars if you want to be the real mahjong master.


*** CHRISTMAS MAHJONG SANTA FEATURES ***

* Beautiful mahjong Christmas theme
* Unique artwork
* Intuitive gameplay and controls
* undo, hint and reshuffle features
* Facebook integration
* Challenging, with progressive difficulty
* Game for all ages
